languages.text: "Вношу в протокол: возражений не последовало, априори вина признана".
"Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."
languages.original_text: "Вношу в протокол: возражений не последовало, априори вина признана".

traits.locale_text: "Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."
"Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."
"Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."
"Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."
"Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."

languages.text: "Aktenvermerk: Es wurden keine Dementis abgegeben, Schuldeingeständnis a priori. "
languages.original_text: "Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."

traits.locale_text: "Aktenvermerk: Es wurden keine Dementis abgegeben, Schuldeingeständnis a priori. "

languages.text: « Qu'il soit consigné au procès-verbal qu'aucune contestation n'a été formulée et que la culpabilité a été de facto reconnue. »
languages.original_text: "Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'il soit consigné au procès-verbal qu'aucune contestation n'a été formulée et que la culpabilité a été de facto reconnue. »

languages.text: “被告未进行申辩，等同于承认有罪，上述内容已记录在案。”
languages.original_text: "Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."

traits.locale_text: “被告未进行申辩，等同于承认有罪，上述内容已记录在案。”

languages.text: «Que quede registrado: no se han negado los hechos; se admite la culpa a priori».
languages.original_text: "Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."

traits.locale_text: «Que quede registrado: no se han negado los hechos; se admite la culpa a priori».

languages.text: 「以下を記録に残します。被告からの否認はなく、最初から有罪を認めたものと見なされる」
languages.original_text: "Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."

traits.locale_text: 「以下を記録に残します。被告からの否認はなく、最初から有罪を認めたものと見なされる」

languages.text: "Kayıtlara geçsin: Herhangi bir redde bulunulmamış, suçlamalar kayıtsız şartsız kabul edilmiştir."
languages.original_text: "Let the record reflect: no denials were offered, a priori guilt is admitted."

traits.locale_text: "Kayıtlara geçsin: Herhangi bir redde bulunulmamış, suçlamalar kayıtsız şartsız kabul edilmiştir."
